definition: to hang or suspend/to worry/public announcement/unresolved/baseless/without foundation
suspense in a movie, play etc/concern for sb's welfare
pending a decision/hanging in the balance
to hang in the air/suspended in midair/(fig.) uncertain
sheer cliffs and precipitous rock faces (idiom)
mouth like a torrent (idiom)/eloquent/glib/voluble/have the gift of the gab

sentences.english: Thin film the scroll, clear bright light suspension.
sentences.chinese: 疏影临书卷，清光皓月悬。

sentences.english: Moreover, the curve can represent hyperbolas and catenary exactly.
sentences.chinese: 此外，它可以精确表示双曲线和悬链线。

sentences.english: The moon still hangs low in the sky, casting dim yellow light.
sentences.chinese: 那半个月亮仍悬在半空，发出昏黄的光。

sentences.english: Out of the southwest of Taiyuan fifty years, there is a mountain hanging urn.
sentences.chinese: 出太原西南行五十里，有一座山名悬瓮。

sentences.english: A 25-watt lamp was suspended from the ceiling, functioning to luminate us every night.
sentences.chinese: 顶上悬一个25瓦的白炽灯泡，在夜晚给予光明。

sentences.english: Suspended Peak, five stamping on the Dougong, Liangjia Basilica structure and a slightly different approach.
sentences.chinese: 悬山顶，五踩斗拱，梁架结构与大殿做法略有不同。

sentences.english: I'm holdin' on your rope, got me ten feet off the ground…
sentences.chinese: 我悬在你的绳子上，离地十英尺。

sentences.english: The moon was low in the sky.
The end of the year, Jet Li's heart is still hanging.
sentences.chinese: 进入岁末，李连杰的心仍悬着。

sentences.english: They have a short, dark mane, a dewlap hanging from the throat, and long horns twisted in a tight spiral.
sentences.chinese: 有黑色短鬃毛，喉部有下悬的肉垂，长角盘扭成螺旋。

sentences.english: The tiled roof was of sea-green porcelain, and the jutting eaves were festooned with little bells.
sentences.chinese: 屋顶以海青色的瓷瓦铺就，飞檐上则悬着小小的铃铛。

sentences.english: The sun hung low over the misted valley.
sentences.chinese: 太阳低悬在薄雾笼罩的山谷之上。

sentences.english: Removal of rear dewclaws , if present, optional.
sentences.chinese: 单个的悬趾可能出现在前足。

sentences.english: As a lame man hath fair legs in vain: so a parable is unseemly in the mouth of fools.
sentences.chinese: 犹如跛子的脚虚悬无力，箴言在愚人口中也是如此。

sentences.english: Traveller is a key equipment for the cantilevercasting.
sentences.chinese: 挂篮是悬灌施工的关键设备。

definition: top (of the head)/apex/to fall forwards/inverted/to jolt
to suspend/to hang up/to hang a person
a string of 100 cash (arch.)/to lament/to condole with/variant of 吊[diao4]
loose/to loosen/to relax/floss (dry, fluffy food product made from shredded, seasoned meat or fish, used as a topping or filling)
at first/suddenly/abruptly/to spread/(of hair) to stand on end/bristling
erhua variant of 差點|差点[cha4 dian3]
to shake/to vibrate/to jolt/to quake/excited/shocked/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing thunder/☳
to rest/to take a break/to stop/to halt/(dialect) to sleep/a moment/a short while
lit. to hang upside down/fig. in dire straits
